FUNC.NAME: usPostNetreportCheckDigit
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the usPostNet ReportCheckDigit property which enables reporting of the bar code check digit(s).

PARAM.NAME: usPostNetreportCheckDigit
PARAM.DESC: Enables reporting of the check digit.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only usPostNet labels with the ReportCheckDigit property set:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="usPostNet:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="usPostNetreportCheckDigit:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: Above example can also be written as shown below:

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports usPostNet.
